department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Ewer, lobed body, with birds and foliage in low relief, deep blue glaze.
medium: Kashan ware Earthenware with molded decor under lapis-blue glaze
text: This elegant ewer, with its lobed body and bird, foliage, and calligraphic motifs in molded low relief, is one of only a few similar vessels glazed in dark blue that have survived from the Kashan workshops of the late Seljuk period.
title: Ewer
